name: @stawen/azure-certificate
description: Pulumi dynamic provider for Azure App Service Certificate
author: Stanislas DRAUNET

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.version-changelog-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version-make-release
scripts.version-changelog-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version-make-release
scripts.version-changelog-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version-make-release
scripts.version-make-release: npm run version-changelog && npm run version-git-add && npm run version-git-tag-push-release
scripts.version-git-add: git add package.json && git add package-lock.json && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-git-tag-push-release: git commit -m "Publish new release $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version HEAD && git push && git push --tags
